post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
I went through second time father experience last two weeks. It was overwhelming experience. I am not very emotional person. I had witnessed the birth of my second daughter. I did not experience the modern medical science. My wife did the most of the work. We, myself and medical personals, were merely observers. I am not in position to testimony the miracle of birth nor preach how valuable my experience was. Maybe I am still in shocking stage.
However I like to express my second coming opportunity. Not too many peoples receive the second chance to reflect the parenthood. I will have the other chance to make the mistakes. I do not think I was wise father. I was hard on my first daughter. There is no manual for fatherhood. Even though there was I did not know how good the manual was. I had the time to think about my mistakes of being a father.
I can’t promise you I am going to perfect father. At least I have the opportunity to mess up different ways.
Things I am going to try - To write baby journal : It could be good for me to re-exam and good for my daughter. Good reading materials - I am going to confess my mistakes to my first daughter when I come up with better way to raise my second kid - Be more understandable : meaning patience - I will be more doer than talker - More active role as baby care taker - Spend as much time as possible with the kid - Do it together : playing, answering questions, biking, etc - most of all I will enjoy my fatherhood : having fun - To leave good memory of me
Good to be alive.
Quote of Parenthood “If you must hold yourself up to your children as an object lesson, hold yourself up as a warning and not an example.” - George Bernard Shaw
post.title: Second chance
